text: If you can recommend only 10 books to your loved ones, which 10 would it be? e Seneca - Letters from a Stoic e Marcus Aurelius - Meditations Epictetus - Enchiridion Frederic Lenoir - Happiness: A Philosopher's Guide e Jean-Paul Sartre - Nausea ¢ Albert Camus - The Myth of Sisyphus ¢ Fyodor Dostoyevsky - Notes from Underground * George Orwell - 1984 ¢ Harper Lee - To Kill a Mockingbird » Kurt Vonnegut - Slaughterhouse-Five: A Novel
